title: Topics in Decision Sciences
description: Introduces advanced topics of special interest in management and decision sciences. Instructional methods include face-to-face lecture, case presentations, assigned readings, and group discussions. May be taken for credit four times, for a maximum of sixteen units if the topics are significantly different. Students may not earn credit for both MGT 442 and MGT 249 with same course subtitle. They are course equivalents. Prerequisites: MBA student or consent of instructor and department stamp.
